main event: A witness reported seeing a greyish white object disappearing behind clouds in Dayton, Ohio on about 6-7 March 1964.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 10 minutes and the object was observed flying from north to south at a 45-degree elevation., The object was described as having a greyish white color and was moving at an estimated fast speed., The witness was a 13-year-old civilian who was with their brother at the time of the sighting., The investigation concluded the sighting was probably a balloon, but there was insufficient data for a definitive evaluation., The report noted inconsistencies in the data presented regarding the object's flight path.
